function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Individuals reassessing their use of personal protection based on concern for disease and being bitten","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission if individuals do not appropriately use personal protection","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to promote consistent and effective use of personal protection","Technologies":"Health communication technologies for disseminating information and promoting behavior change","People":"General population, especially those in areas with high disease and mosquito activity","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Semi-arbitrary choice of 2 days for length of time in the protected class","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of real-world protective behavior and potential for increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct research to determine an optimal length of time for effective protection based on behavior and disease dynamics","Technologies":"Behavior monitoring and modeling technologies to understand patterns of protection behavior","People":"Model developers, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health research institutions, academic organizations"},{"Description":"Utilizing the parameter for distribution of susceptible individuals between protected and unprotected classes to adjust initial conditions","Impact":"Potential misrepresentation of population susceptibility and risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use data-driven approaches to determine initial distribution of susceptible individuals and ensure accurate representation of population vulnerability","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools for population susceptibility assessment","People":"Public health researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
